item.description:
Come join us for a night of fun, flirty and sexy dancing with Strip Fit class taught by Christie.

This class is enjoyable and leaves you feeling sexy and strong. It is slower paced then hip hop but works the body to the max. We'll start with a warm up that includes some belly dance, latin dance, and hip hop, then really break a sweat learning a fun and flirty chair routine. You will love this fun and empowering class that helps tone your legs, abs, and butt!

Wednesday, March 24th at 8pm

Bridgets Dance Studio
89 Pearl St #5A
Braintree, MA 02184
(Pull into Frazier Parkway, across from Campenelli's, and the third garage door on the left.)

Cost $10 per person (cash please)

When I took this class I wore yoga pants and a tank top. You want to be comfortable and able to move. You will work up a sweat, so remember the water too!
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet you inside the studio

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Strip Fit Dance Class
